name: PowerBIDataRefreshSchedule
description: Updates the data refresh schedule of a dataset or dataflow.
author: bguidinger

inputs.name: Connection
inputs.label: Power BI connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service connection to Power BI.

inputs.name: Workspace
inputs.label: Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the workspace. If not specified, your personal workspace will be used.

inputs.name: Name
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the dataset or dataflow.

inputs.name: Days
inputs.label: Days
inputs.helpMarkDown:
An array of the days of the week.

Example: `[ "Monday", "Wednesday", "Friday" ]`

inputs.name: Times
inputs.label: Times
inputs.helpMarkDown:
An array of the times of the day.

Example: `[ "10:00", "14:00" ]`

inputs.name: Time Zone
inputs.label: Time Zone
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The name of the time zone from this list. [link](https://support.microsoft.com/help/973627/microsoft-time-zone-index-values).

Example: `Central Standard Time`
